summary:
Standlone female Nord follower.

Class: Warrior.
Body: UNPB (minimum weight).
Location: Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
Default Equipment: Leather Armour (no Helmet), Iron sword, Hunting Bow, 100 Iron Arrows.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.minus.com/i2yggjB7D1n4a.jpeg[/img]

[font=Palatino Linotype] [size=+3] [b] [color=green] [u]About [/u][/color] [/b] [/size] [/font]
Standalone female Nord Follower called Finna.
Protected and Marriageable

[b]Body:[/b] UNPB (minimum weight).
[b]Voice Type:[/b] FemaleYoungEager (same voice as Brelyna, Jordis, Hroki, Ysolda, Elisif, Camilla and more)
[b]Class:[/b] Warrior.
[b]Skills:[/b] One Handed, Two Handed, Archery, Block, Heavy Armour and Light Armour
[b]Level:[/b] Auto level 10-50
[b]Perks:[/b] None (Followers are too powerful with perks)
[b]Location:[/b] Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
[b]Default Equipment:[/b] Leather Armour (no Helmet), Iron sword, Hunting Bow, 100 Iron Arrows.
[b]2 versions:[/b] Apachii hair Version and SG hair Version. (can only use 1 at a time)

[color=yellow]=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=[/color]

[font=Palatino Linotype] [size=+3] [b] [color=green] [u] Requirements [/u][/color] [/b] [/size] [/font]
Patch 1.9 (The last patch)

[color=yellow]=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=[/color]

[font=Palatino Linotype] [size=+3] [b] [color=green][u] Installation [/u][/color] [/b] [/size] [/font]
[b]Manually:[/b] Copy the and paste the meshes and textures folders and Finna.esp into the Skyrim Data folder. Click "yes to all" if asked.

Or use Nexus Mod Manager.

If you use one version and want to swap over to the other one so she has different hair, just download the other version and click "yes to all" when asked. make sure to take all of Finna's inventory just to be safe. :)

[color=yellow]=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=[/color]

[font=Palatino Linotype] [size=+3] [b] [color=green] [u] Uninstallation [/u] [/color] [/b] [/size] [/font]
If she is following, Dismiss her then leave the cell (go through a loading screen).

[b]Manually:[/b]
Data/meshes/actors/character - then remove the folder named Finna.
Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom - then remove the folder named Finna.esp
Data/textures/actors/character - then remove the folder named Finna.
Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint - then remove the folder named Finna.esp
Now remove Finna.esp from the Skyrim Data Folder.

[color=yellow]=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=[/color]

And thanks to Nefsen and Prreeve for the images and testing. :)
